title: Jon Vaughn, Survivor of Sexual Abuse By Former Michigan Doctor Robert Anderson
description:
Jon Vaughn joins Kirk to discuss his efforts to expose sexual abuse that he and countless of others experienced at the hands of Robert Anderson at Michigan.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
